detail_desc: Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Tops in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a picot trim at the top and decorative bow at the front.
Metal glasses chain. Length approx. 80 cm.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, classic front and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved romper suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a large flounce at the top and cups with removable inserts.
Straight-style top in sturdy, striped cotton jersey with long sleeves.
Lined, underwired bikini top with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Double-breasted, oversized jacket in woven fabric with peak lapels and flap front pockets. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled.
Small wallet in imitation suede with a zip at the top that continues down one side. One card slot. Lined. Size 8.5x10 cm.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and short sleeves trimmed with a gathered frill.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Top in glittery tulle with short, wide puff sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
V-neck jersey top with a small, gathered stand-up collar, and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow cuffs and a button.
Shorts in stretch twill with an embroidered motif on one side, an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Fake front pockets and real back pockets.
String briefs in cotton-blend jersey with a low waist with wide elastication and a lined gusset.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back and embroidery on the front.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Round-necked T-shirt in heavy cotton jersey with a print motif. Relaxed fit with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front, lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Tie in patterned silk. Width 7 cm.
Top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck, button placket and butterfly sleeves.
Calf-length skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, buttons down the front and fake flap front pockets. Lined.
Trainers with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Calf-length jersey dress with a wrapover front, deep V-neck and a seam at the waist with pleats that go all the way round. Yoke at the back, a press-stud fastening at the waist, dropped shoulders and long, tapered sleeves. Unlined.

Straight-cut blouse in an airy cotton weave with buttons down the front and a large, double-layered collar with a narrow frill trim. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short denim dress with a V-neck, short sleeves and gathered seam at the hem.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles and a strap with tassels at the top, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Unlined. Size 13x23x29.5 cm.
Short-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, side pockets and contrasting colour mesh panels down the sides of the legs. Reflective details.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood and zip down the front. Lined.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with a wide foldover top, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in cotton with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and moulded, padded cups that lift and shape while providing good support. Elasticated hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes. Medium support.
Metal rings in various designs, four of which are decorated with a plastic stone.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Short-sleeved wrapover top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, hook-and-eye fastener at the top, narrow elasticated seam at the waist and sewn-in tie at the side.
Long metal earrings decorated with velvet-covered plastic beads and fabric tassels. Length 15 cm.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.

Dress in a patterned modal weave with a round neckline with gathers at the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a seam at the waist with a decorative bow. Unlined.
T-shirt in supersoft jersey made from a viscose blend with a photographic print on the front.
Metal hoop earrings in various designs. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 3 cm.

Non-wired push-up bra designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed denim with stretch. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and gently tapered legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red/white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, and regular waist with concealed elastication. Side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket skirt in washed denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, and a frayed, raw-edge hem.
Jersey trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and elasticated hems.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Joggers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.

Dress in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Gathered seam at the waist, a detachable, braided imitation suede belt and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a lace yoke.

Blouse in woven fabric with a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with smocking and a flounce at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut dress in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.

Knee-length dirndl with a detachable apron. Sleeveless dress in a patterned weave with lace trims, a deep, square neckline and decorative lacing at the front. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a pocket in one side. Apron with long ties and decorative lace trims above the hem. Lined at the top.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, sewn on bow at the front, button on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Brushed inside.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in a soft rib knit in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps.

Lightweight running jacket in windproof functional fabric with reflective details. Hood with an elastic drawstring at the back, zip down the front and a ventilating yoke and small zipped pocket at the back. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. Size of pocket 10.5x18.5 cm.
Short shorts in a cotton weave with embroidery, an elasticated waist and scalloped broderie anglaise trims at the hems.
Dress in soft woven fabric with short frilled sleeves, a yoke and buttons at the back. Unlined.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar, ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.

Pyjamas with a long top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and pair of leggings in jersey. Top with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Leggings in soft, printed jersey with an elasticated waist.

V-neck sports bra in fast-drying, functional fabric with mesh details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide elastic straps that cross at the back, a wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Medium support. The bra is made partly from recycled polyester and polyamide.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Decorative seams at the knees, down the legs and at the hems.

Wide dress in airy, lightly crinkled chiffon with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the top. Long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs, and a voluminous skirt with gathered tiers. V-neck underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.

Sturdy shoulder bag with a metal decoration on the flap, concealed magnetic fastener under the flap and a detachable shoulder strap with metal chains at the ends. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 7x14x17 cm.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless romper suit in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with shoulder straps that cross at the back and fasten at the back of the waistband with press-studs. Elastication at the back, press-studs at the crotch and elastication with decorative gathers at the hems.
